Introduction
This topic contains information on DCs that provide for indefinite periods of schedular temporary total evaluation, including
indefinite periods of schedular temporary total evaluation under a DC
definition of indefinite periods of schedular temporary total evaluation
prospective ratings under indefinite periods of schedular temporary total evaluation and 38 CFR 3.105(e)
retrospective evaluations of indefinite periods of schedular temporary total evaluation and 38 CFR 3.105(e)
cancer evaluations
, and
an example of aÂ staged cancer evaluation
.
title: M21-1, Part VIII, Subpart iv, Chapter 8, Section D - Other Temporary Total Evaluations
citation: Part VIII, Subpart iv, Chapter 8, Section D
